member.summary: Wait or poll for a response message from a sync request id object.
member.param: SyncRequestId object as returned by a successful \a send() call.

member.summary: Deserialize a response. This function should only be called if the received response is valid. This can be determined using ContentGatewayClient.isValidResponse(). Note the response block list is not cleared down by this function, so it is possible to build a complete ResponseBlockList from multiple partial responses.
member.param: HeapMessage as passed to ContentGatewayClient.on*Response() or returned by SyncRequestId.getResponse().
reference to a ResponseParameters object to receive deserialized response blocks.
